sentences_tone.text: Exercise has such a profound effect on our happiness and well-being that it is an effective strategy for overcoming depression.
In a study cited in Shawn Achor's book The Happiness Advantage, three groups of patients treated their depression with medication, exercise, or a combination of the two.
The results of this study are surprising: Although all three groups experienced similar improvements in their happiness levels early on, the follow-up assessments proved to be radically different
